description: Transform the classic BLT sandwich into an epic salad that's drizzled with a creamy garlic dressing. The best part? It's on the table in 20 minutes.
name: BLT Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large chargrill pan over high heat. Spray both sides of bread with oil. Grill bread for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Set aside.
Add bacon to pan. Grill for 2 minutes on each side or until crisp. Transfer to a board and roughly chop.
Meanwhile, place mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic and lemon juice in a bowl and whisk to combine. Season.
Place some of the bread slices in a large bowl. Arrange lettuce, tomato, onion, avocado and bacon around bread. Drizzle with dressing and serve with remaining bread slices.
